extendedInfo.description: Run Gingerbread man, Run!Gingerbread manâs grand escape adventure, OvenBreak!Our crunchy cookie hero, Gingerbread man, wakes in the witchâs magic oven.Help him break out of the oven !Once you start running, you can't stop! Get as far as the stars, jump over holes, slide under creamy traps, hook your candy cane into helpful objects!It all looks cute, but don't forget: you are running for your life. Don't die on a plate, next to a glass of milk.The whole world plays Ovenbreak: now, itâs your turn!FEATURESâ Addictive and super easy controls!- Jump (left button) : Jump over collapsed paths.- Slide (right button) : Slide under large obstacles- Jump/swing (right button) : Press the right button while jumping, Gingerbread man will swing up his candy caneâ Collect Jelly Beans!- Basic Jelly Bean : Get a higher score.- Alphabet Jelly Bean : Complete the word âFREEDOMâ and gain bonus life and extra points.- Super Jelly Bean : Get 2,000 super points.â Various ModesPlay from easy mode to hard mode, and enjoy the special infinite mode~There are different graphics for different modes. See how they're different as you run from the kitchen to space!Experience the grand escape of whole new OvenBreak right now!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: To those who may think this game sucks will your wrong its either you or your phone, well to me this is a grreat game I think its suitable for long rides in the car if your travelling around the country! If I could I would rate 7 stars! Big round of applause!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Ovenbreak\'s pretty cool. But it\'s a little bit hard to earn gummies and I don\'t want to purchase them. Overall, it has good graphics and it\'s a great game for all ages!
reviews.author: Shanel Han

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It is quit cool and really full. To play  PS. I love one direction:-)

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: This was one of my favorite games on my iPhone and I was so happy to find out that the app was also available for android! One of my favorite games, extremely fun and addicting!

reviews.comment: It is very awesome and fun i would rate it 9 star if i could overall it is very fun in my opinion!

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: I\'m very pleased with this game. Very straightforward and easy to get the hang of. I would recommend it.

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: While I admit that I still have a ways to go before actually mastering the game, I say the game is quite fun and charming in its own way. I recommend anyone give it a try.  Also, I look foward to any new Com2uS releases. Your games are really addicting!
